EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.Boston SI PCF Track
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Partner Days - Boston - June 29th, 2017 | Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Partner Days in Boston!
We look forward to hosting you at our partner event. Your event confirmation details can be found below:
What: Pivotal Partner Days System Integrator Workshop: PCF Fundamentals Track When: June 29, 2017 Where: Cambridge Innovation Center, 1 Broadway, Cambridge, MA 02142
The event will begin promptly at 11:00am. Please arrive 15 minutes early to sign in.
This is a technical event, so remember to bring your laptops! Also, in advance of the session you selected, please complete the following:
- Download the CF CLI <[[https://console.run.pivotal.io/tools]]> - We will be executing the labs on Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io/]]>. Please sign-up for a trial account. If you have an expired trial account please let us know and we will resolve the problem. Optionally, try out the 15-minute tutorial <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry/introduction]]> to get your feet wet.
If you have any questions please contact Cameron Stewart (cstewart@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cstewart@pivotal.io]]>) or Andrew Mackenzie (amackenzie@pivotal.io <[[mailto:amackenzie@pivotal.io]]>).
Thanks and we look forward to seeing you in Boston!
- Pivotal Partner Alliances Team
